currencySelector.autoSwitchCurrencyBasedOnLocation: Auto Switch currency based on Location
currencySelector.convertCurrencyToNonListed: Auto switch currency to above listed currency only
currencySelector.convertCurrencyToNonListedDisc:
If this option turn on, then app don't automatically switch to customer currency if it's not listed in the above list.
NOTE: This option only work if Auto location is turn on.

theme.showCurrencyCodesOnly: Show currency code only in currency box dropdown list

display.customPositionPlaceholder: Custom position id to display currency box
display.showOriginalPriceOnMouseHover: Show original price on mouse over
display.showCheckoutCurrencyNotificationInCart: Show checkout currency notification in cart
display.proTip: Pro Tip: Turn off both desktop and mobile above to hide currency converter box

priceDisplayOption.roundingDecimalNotEqualToZero: Rounding decimal does not equal to zero
priceDisplayOption.exampleText: Eg: If the converted price is $9.61 it will displayed as $9.{{val}}
priceDisplayOption.enablePriceRounding: Enable price rounding for default store currency

activateInstantLoader.alert: NOTE: We will add a small script to the theme file to enable the instant loader to work properly. So, TURN OFF instant Loader before uninstalling.

review.title: We've got a bigger mission!
review.paragraphOne: We are in a mission to help 100K Merchants for getting started with e-commerce by the end of this year.
review.subHeadingTwo: How does your 1 review so much valuable?
review.listOne: Pure Motivation; Yes, It motivates our developers to turn more coffees into codes.
review.listTwo: It helps to reach more merchants in the Shopify app store.
review.paragraphTwo: Support our mission by leaving a good review.
review.paragraphThree: To err is human; to help is divine.
review.iSupportAndClaim: I support & claim FREE 5 months trial
review.skipSupportMission: Skip, I will pay for app!

hardRefreshAlert.title: Please do hard refresh to see the changes in shopify store after changing the config.
